languages | blank1_name = | blank1_info = | website = | footnotes = | name = Himachal Pradesh }} Himachal Pradesh (Hindi: हिमाचल प्रदेश) is a state in northern India. Shimla is the capital of Himachal Pradesh. It covers an area of . The land contains high mountains. In traditional Indian geography it falls under the North Indian zone. It borders to Jammu and Kashmir to the north. Himachal Pradesh was part of Indian Punjab before 1966. == Administrative divisions of Himachal Pradesh == The State of HP is divided into three Divisions, namely Mandi Division, Kangra Division, Shimla Division. The divisions are further sub-divided into 12 districts. These are further divided into 73 sub-divisions, 172 tehsils and 35 sub-tehsils. == Districts of Himachal Pradesh == #Bilaspur #Chamba #Hamirpur #Kangra #Kinnaur #Kullu #Lahaul & Spiti #Mandi #Shimla #Sirmaur #Solan #Una ==Proposed districts== Following districts are proposed for creation in Himachal Pradesh: *Mahasu *Surendranagar *Rampur Bushhar *Karsog *Palampur *Noorpur *Dehra ==Gallery== File:Mountain peaks, Lahul.jpg|Mountain peaks in Lahul, Himachal Pradesh File:Rothang Pass and Lady.jpg| Lady near Rothang Pass, Himachal Pradesh ==State symbols of Himachal Pradesh== File:WestTragopan.jpg|Western tragopan, state bird File:Uncia uncia.jpg|Snow Leopard, state animal File:Cedrus deodara Manali 2.jpg|Cedrus deodara, state tree File:Pink Rhododendron Blossom Prashar Himachal Apr11 P1020872.jpg|Pink Rhododendron, state flower ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Himachal Pradesh Government * Himachal Pradesh Development Report * Himachal Tourism Website * Himachal's Daily news website
